channel.title: Am i allowed to post?
channel.description:
I am not sure i need to post it here.. But Lets start :D
I downloaded Demise pk 5. And i Fully Changed everthing , Added Minigames (Also self maded) , added shops , added teles , Added commands , Added Quests , Added a good Economy (first it was pure pk) , maded few skills work , Maded new home , maded staffzone and donaterzone. Maded shops work. (They didnt work.) added Npcdrops. and few stuff more.
Am i allowed to post this server on the Server download page? if i give some credits to Demise pk.

item.title: Am i allowed to post?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:9, topic:370961”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=467054.msg3415806#msg3415806 date=1291064747]

As long as you give appropriate credits based on how much work each person did,
then you can post almost any source.

No, you don’t have to give percent per person, just their name.

I’m Talking about people who take a delta base, Change the name on the client, and maybe move a few npcs around, and then give themselves 50% credits.

Well i am not doing that. I worked hours on it (Better can say Days!) And it is from a Pure pk server with ::item to a Great economy server.
[/quote]

Yes but keep in mind that spending months on a server adding and editing content is menial to the amount of work put in to originally creating it.[/quote]

Ofcours i will mind that.

Read full topic
